name: Softlight Skin-Smoothing Hydrating Non-Comedogenic Foundation
about: What it is:  A clean, medium coverage foundation thatu2019s smoothing, weightless and buildable. Has a natural finish and is ideal for acne-prone skin...Coverage: Medium..Finish: Natural..Formulation: Liquid..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Adaptive Skin-Balancing Complex: Visibly reduces redness, pores, excess oil; good for acne-prone skin..- Targeted Hydration Complex with Ectoin: Emollient blend to calm, replenish, and hydrate skin where needed..- Fermented Reishi Mushroom: Supports the moisture barrier for plumper-, smoother-looking skin...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This innovative, non-comedogenic formula blurs and smooths for a natural-looking, soft-focus finish. Bioengineered skincare balances the skin to calm, hydrate and brighten while visibly minimizing pores, blemishes, redness and excess oil for custom-fit coverage. Available in 31 shades...Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Adaptive Skin-Balancing Complex: Visibly reduces redness, pores, excess oil; good for acne-prone skin..-Targeted Hydration Complex with Ectoin: Emollient blend to calm, replenish, and hydrate skin where needed..-Fermented Reishi Mushroom: Supports the moisture barrier for plumper-, smoother-looking skin...Water/Aqua/Eau, Dimethicone, Trisiloxane, Glycerin, C9-12 Alkane, Polyphenylsilsesquioxane, Phenyl Trimethicone, Polyglyceryl-3 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Propanediol, Octyldodecanol, Dimethicone/Polyglycerin-3 Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Ectoin, Squalane, Ganoderma Lucidum (Mushroom) Extract, Evodia Rutaecarpa Fruit Extract, Leptospermum Scoparium Branch/Leaf Oil, Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract, Piper Nigrum (Pepper) Seed Extract, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Pentylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Tocopherol, Triethyl Citrate, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Chloride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum, 1,2-Hexanediol, [+/-: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)]......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Shake well before use. .-Dispense a small amount onto back of hand, then blend onto complexion with fingers or brush. .-Apply more to build coverage, if desired...Recycling Instructions:.-Remove pump, wash any remaining product from bottle and place bottle, cap, carton, and insert in recycling bin. .-Discard pump in trash.

reviews.review_title: Found THE foundation! Ordered it on their website.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got my foundation for full price cause even if I tried it in the wrong shade, I knew I would love this foundation. (I do Wish they had my shade here! Their Shade range is stunning and the neutral shade I have is really nice. Not too yellow or not too red, matches really well with my skin. Im 13N! Their Shade range is impressive for a clean brand. Seems like Sephora may no longer carry this brand with this drastic sale which is a shame if so cause this foundation is STUNNING. I tried it in the wrong shade since it's on sale here (also thought it MIGHT be my shade, just had to go one or 2 down!) and even ifs it was the wrong shade, I knew I had to get it in my actual shade because it was really good and took over my current favorite of a year 1/2 the Nars Light Reflecting foundation. My Nars foundation got messed up during travel and I was going to repurchase, but the Nars foundation isn't perfect for my preference, I remember wanting to try the rose inc foundation so much.  I've used this every other day for the past 2 & a half weeks during outings in humid Texas heat and with products I like it and it definitely is one of the best. It did not break me out, did not accentuate any textured dry areas. I even bought the concealer and that's really good as well! Their lipstick is lovely too hehe.   I've tried many foundations and my personal preference is something light that doesn't get greasy during long wear with a softer natural almost seamless skin with a soft glow. I can't speak for all skin types but definitely works best for me with acne prone/ dry combo with a bit of oily skin. That looks gorgeous in photos and in person. This is quite natural with a nice amount of coverage with a nice glow and is buildable. With the right products this could be it for you also because for me it's definitely perfect and I'll be repurchasing this.

reviews.review_text: i'm surprised that this foundation has negative reviews RE breakouts. i switched to this foundation from the RMS one about 2 months ago as it's considered acne-safe per this website that checks for pore clogging ingredients: https://acneclinicnyc.com/pore-clogging-ingredients/ i'm very acne prone and i have been breaking out much less since started using this foundation (along with the ROSE INC concealer). it's a very smooth but lighweight formula that you can build and the color matches my skin tone perfectly. i just bought my second bottle during the sephora sale! highly recommend and i will be a continued customer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: How is this labeled as non comeodoneic? The SECOND INGREDIENT IS SILICONE.  This broke me out, and broke me out bad.  That's why it left my skin smooth! This does have a nice finish and looks great but if you are silicone sensitive, like me, stay away from this. It is basically a silicone primer with some color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: loved this formula. My skin looked so smooth. My fiance even thought I wasn't wearing any makeup on my face.

reviews.review_title: Please please never discontinue this product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily, acne prone skin and no one seems to make products for my skin type anymore. Everything is u201cdewyu201d and u201cradiantu201d and full of comedogenic ingredients. They pill when layered over my sunscreen and acne products, and separate and turn patchy over the course of the day. This is the only foundation Iu2019ve found that looks good all day. No pilling, no separation, and no comedogenic ingredients. It doesnu2019t oxidize either, which is a huge peeve of mine. 11W is a perfect match for my skin. My only wish was that it had a truly matte finish. My skin creates its own u201cdewinessu201d, so if I start with anything less than a super matte finish, I end up looking very shiny. Otherwise I love this product and I never want to be without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been having an allergic reaction to this product, Iu2019m not sure why. It causes me to have huge red sores where I use it on my face, and making my eyes itchy. Hoping I can still return it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this foundation a little while ago. I just used it for a few days in a row and I got a significant skin breakout. On top of that with my skin tone, I'm prone to hyperpigmentation. So now I have to deal with lightening the scarring. I thought this foundation would work great given the brand tries to use ingredients good for the skin. But it has black pepper extract. After I completed some research, I discovered that it is rated high for skin sensitivity and can be highly irritating. Be careful if you have sensitive or reactive skin. In terms of wear, I think it looks good for 4 hours and then starts to break down on oily areas. Similar to others, I find the foundation sits on top and does not really set it. I use LM talc free setting powder and Lisa Eldridge setting spray (holy grail). I can't return this product since it past the 60 day mark. A complete waste of $75. I've become ruthless to purchase from brands that use good ingredients but I will be more vigilant. I'm going to stick with higher end brands such as Victoria Beckham Beauty and Lisa Eldridge. I do like some Rose Inc products, but this has really put me off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The finish and the way it felt in the coverage was really it really made my skin look better and smoother and my pores look good too also it was wonderful that this was a vegan product because they're not many products around that are vegan inspired so this was a definite plus, oh great one for vegans

reviews.review_title: Finally found my shade and also clean ingredients!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it so much! I got my shades with the help of sephora rep because I'm bad at that lol. I'm not a foundation wearer either and I used to care less about foundation but I know basic stuff on that (primer first, brush vs. Beauty blender, etc).  I also have combo dry oil skin and my skin is just loving it. First of all, I have read reviews that some primer won't blend well and the staff told me that primer isn't necessary. Yes it's a medium coverage, and I prefer that than full coverage because it gives your natural look but flawless ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this lovely foundation based on the reviews and it is awesome! I have worn it for 12 hours now and it has not budged!!! It feels incredibly light weight and has this really nice blurring effect. I have acne prone skin with a pretty oily t-zone and this did not make me shiny at the end of the day. I forgot to wear primer this morning so this is the foundation after I used only moisturizer. Really in love with this foundation right now and would definitely buy it again!!! (In the picture I am wearing shade 20N)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a BEAUTIFUL foundation! I rarely write reviews but this deserves all the praise ud83dude4c First, I love that itu2019s both non toxic & acne safe. So many beauty brands these days claim to be u201ccleanu201d or non comedogenic and are not. My skin is combination/dry, super sensitive & acne prone. For me, a foundation has to layer nicely over serums, moisturizer + spf. This one sits perfectly on top & doesnu2019t pill. Also, I donu2019t even need to set this foundation with powder which shocked me considering I live in south Texas. Another plus is that Iu2019ve never found a shade match to be this spot onu2014 itu2019s PERFECT. In face products Iu2019m always a light neutral or light medium neutral. Iu2019m a TRUE neutral, & often times with other brands the u201cneutralu201d shades lean warm or yellow. My shade in this, 10N, is described as a light medium neutral olive, and thatu2019s exactly what it is. I couldnu2019t be happier. So far Iu2019ve applied with my fingers, which I didnu2019t quite love, and with a damp beauty blender which gave me a gorgeous finish. I highly recommend this foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the dewy finish that this foundation provides. The coverage is perfect, covers well without being chalky or feeling overdone. I had been looking for a clean makeup that meets my needs and I have found it.

reviews.review_text: I don't normally write reviews but this is amazing! It wears like second skin. I developed fungal acne after surgery/steroids & switched to new products.  this caused no skin issues and wears beautifully.

IT TURNS OUT THE ONE OF INGREDIENTS CONTAINS MUSHROOMS! WHICH IM HIGHLY ALLERGIC TOO.  BE CAREFUL BEFORE TRYING ON YOUR SKIN. JUST THE INGREDIENTS! PLEASE

reviews.review_text: My skin was so soft once I put this on. The only thing I didnu2019t love is that I donu2019t feel it stayed on all day, but itu2019s long a matte long wear anyway. I have very dry skin and my skin didnu2019t look dry or feel dry at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this. Perfect shade, beautiful bottle, luxurious consistency. It didnu2019t sit well on my skin at all; it separated quickly and exaggerated texture that isnu2019t even noticeable without makeup on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried it on today and omg, itu2019s really nice. The finish is so incredibly soft, angelic, and natural. Itu2019s extremely light weight and Iu2019d say the coverage is on the lighter side, but buildable without looking cakey. I used it with a brush (saie foundation brush) and a beauty blender. Both applications were really nice but honestly itu2019s easier to use a beauty blender. The texture is almost too liquify for a brush to handle so I recommend using something else. I also didnu2019t use a primer because Iu2019m learning that itu2019s really not a necessary step and if the formulas donu2019t match well then it does more harm than good. It went on looking amazing without any primer, just moisturizer- I use the belief aqua bomb itu2019s literally the best. Oh also, I have oily, acne prone skin and it didnu2019t budge. You still need to spot conceal because as I said itu2019s not full coveraaage. I love !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I give this four stars because it states itu2019s hydrating but itu2019s actually more drying/matte. If you have oily skin this would be great for you. Great color match and didnu2019t break me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Listen, no product is going to make EVERYONE happy, but I have a hard time accepting the low reviews on this one.  I struggle with perioral dermatitis and super sensitive skin and most foundation burns for a while after I put it on and flares my dermatitis. Not this guy. So I would say soothing for sure. Itu2019s not overly moisturizing, feels like my skin but better. I have always powered my foundation and other natural brands tend to sit on the skin like an oily mask. Again, not this guy. reviews.review_text: Absolutely exquisite! Iu2019m in love with the coverage! Itu2019s not a dry flaky coverage! Looks amazing and stays all day! It was easy to cover the little blemishes! Also pretty pigmented compared to other products from this line so a little bit goes a long way! Gifted from Rose.inc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best foundation I have ever used. This checks all the boxes for me in what I look for in a foundation, which is extremely rare: cruelty-free, non-comedogenic, hydrating AND matte, skin benefits with use, medium-natural coverage, made for acne-prone skin. Coverage is on lighter side, but is buildable and it feels and looks very natural. This does not set into any lines. I usually have makeup show in my undereye creases and I don't like to powder that area since it can really make my under eyes dry and pre-age me. This is the first foundation that I don't have any creasing or settling into lines. I have oily/combo skin and I always have to set my whole face with a powder. I don't have to with this one, which is another first. I absolutely love how this feels on the skin and it wears beautifully throughout the day (I might even argue it looks better as the day goes on). I also have acne-prone skin and have not had a single break out with use. It can cling on to some dry patches, but properly moisturizing before use changes that. My only gripe about this line is I wish there was a larger shade range. I'm hopeful we will see more in the future since this was just released. It does oxidize slightly after use, which is why I am able to get away with 8N. Just wish there was a warmer/olive tone lighter than 10W.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin: dry, acne-prone, best described as fair neutral leaning olive  ...imagine my shock and sheer joy at seeing shade 2 labeled as a fair neutral olive foundation.  WHAT!? Rose Inc thought of us!? :')  Let's chat about the shade first. Rose Inc really did understand the assignment here. Olive undertones are not walking around looking like little green aliens; we have a slight bit of green in our skin, and our skin can still can lean warm, cool, or neutral. As such, this shade really is my perfect match. It's more muted in it's color, meaning no bright greens, no cool pink, no orange - just a perfect match for fair neutral olives.  The foundation itself is extremely comfortable to wear, and once applied, it feels like nothing. It does not feel drying on my skin nor does it exacerbate breakouts for me (I am writing this review at a week of wear). It looks natural; the definition of my skin but better.  There are some intriguing skincare claims in here too, including adaptogens and humectants, with the brand stating these ingredients may help to plump, smooth, and minimize pores. While it's hard to attest to the long term benefits at this point, I do feel the formula leaves my skin looking smoother and more even while wearing the foundation.  Overall, I am incredibly pleased with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What a beautiful foundation this is. Itu2019s great for a medium coverage smoothing look. Itu2019s pretty matte looking but not drying on my skin. I have combination skin and it works perfectly. I rolled the dice on the shade and it worked perfectly for my yellow undertone. The foundation comes with so many shades the one I picked matches my summer skin tone perfectly. It makes my skin look smoother and flawless. It keeps my skin hydrated for the whole day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Rose Inc and Skeepers the Rose Inc Softlight Skin-Smoothing Liquid Foundation. Itu2019s a beautiful lightweight foundation that offers light to medium coverage. This non-comedogenic foundation provides a soft matte finish while keeping the skin well-hydrated and feels weightless.  I chose the shade 2N Fair Neutral, and even though itu2019s very fair, I was able to make it work. This foundation impressively lasted all day without the need for a touch-up. It didnu2019t cling to any dry spots and maintained a shine-free finish. I would certainly repurchase, but I recommend getting color matched first. Thereu2019s no detectable fragrance, and Iu2019m amazed by its longevity for a light to medium coverage foundation. You can layer it without it looking cakey, and it pairs beautifully with my four different Rose Inc blushes. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this Softlight Skin Smoothing Liquid Foundation from Rose Inc. I have it in 19N and the foundation is creamy and glides over my skin easily. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is an amazing product . It applies smoothly and works well with other products. The foundation give a very lightweight feel on the face and layers well with other products, Especially Rose Inc products . The shade range is amazing .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This exceptional product boasts an incredibly lightweight texture, providing a barely-there sensation upon application. Designed to cater to dry and sensitive skin, it delivers a delightful satin finish while offering medium coverage, essentially enhancing your natural beauty. Throughout the day, it maintains its flawless look, devoid of any pore-clogging or fine line exaggeration issues typically associated with less hydrating alternatives. Remarkably, this product possesses the power to blur pores, leaving your skin with a radiant, glowing appearance. It's a conscientious choice as well, being both vegan and non-comedogenic, ensuring it won't trigger breakouts. Feel confident in your choice as it's a product that's not only kind to animals but also your skin. For a visual testimony, please refer to the attached before and after photos.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This Softlight Skin Smoothing Liquid Foundation is super lightweight. It has medium coverage and you can buildup as you go. It looks really good at 8 hours and I did not need to touch up. It goes smoothly on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. It goes on so smoothly and makes my skin look really great! Provides great coverage and makes my skin look absolutely flawless. Itu2019s also a clean and vegan product! Iu2019d get this again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I Can honestly say I love this foundation. It has a dewy satin formula and finish. I like to take my time sometimes to get ready so I like that I can let this sit on my face and it will still blend beautifully after a few minutes. I find it works better with fingers or a dry sponge.  The coverage is medium and it layers beautifully with concealer and takes powder well! Well I noticed though was that my face seemed to look better after a few hours of wearing it and my skin felt better after washing it off! The bottle is heavy and frosted so it looks lovely on a vanity or desk. I canu2019t wait to try more items from Rose Inc, gifted by Rose In

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the texture of this, and itu2019s super hydrating. The coverage is pretty sheer but it goes on nicely over moisturizer for a really natural polished look. The packaging is also super luxe, and you get a nice amount of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is not my favorite foundation. It takes a while to blend into the skin and not look streaky post application. Itu2019s very thin coverage and for the price it is I would rather buy other brands. I do think the shade matches my skin tone well and they have a wide range of shades.

reviews.review_title: Perfect match for medium (warm) olive skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation may have just reached HG status for me! The shade 16W matches perfectly to my skin tone (warm medium olive) and works great with my dry/combo skin! Most olive foundations are either peachy or grey on me but this is literally perfect. For reference, my closest shades in other brands are Armani Luminous Silk 6, Estee Lauder Double Wear in Fawn, and CoverFX G+ Medium 2 (closest).  I was initially worried it would be drying but it looks like second skin on me. It immediately smoothed out the texture of my skin. It's very lightweight and lasts all day. I didn't see any significant wear after 8 hours. It has a medium/buildable coverage and you don't need a lot to get a no-makeup makeup look. It's a great mix of comfortable and long lasting.  I'm very impressed by this foundation and glad to finally have a shade match in an amazing formula. It was my first product from Rose Inc and I'm motivated to buy other products from them after trying this out. If you have a combo or oily skin type, you'll love this this since it is non-comedogenic. Dry skin can make this work very easily too (prep well if you use it in the winter). I would highly recommend checking out this product. This is already on my wish list to buy once I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really beautiful foundation. Unfortunately, I did pick the wrong shade. I will be saving this for when it gets a bit colder and I am more pale as it is a really nice consistency and coverage for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation as a complementary from Rose INC.  Unfortunately, the foundation shade was way too dark on my skin but I was able to mix it with a white mixing pigment to get it to match my skin and it looked really nice and lasted about 6-7 hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oooo girl! This is a must! I found the absolute perfect color for the summer to winter skin transition. It also goes on so smooth and blends well! I love how natural it looks. It really looks like your own skin, just better. Itu2019s not cakey at all! Honestly I think itu2019s moisturizing too, which really is perfect for the upcoming winter months!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation blew my mind! The color match is SO good, it just looks like skin! It blends like a dream and the coverage sticks around all day. I didnu2019t realize how much redness I had to cover as you can see in my before and after photos but this really did create a flawless base for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually don't use liquid foundation because I have had issues matching the correct color for my skintone and/or the formula looks unnatural and cakey on my skin.  This foundation is vegan, non-acnegenic & non-comedogenic. I chose 7C Light Cool and it was a perfect match. Based on my before picture, it's obvious that I struggle with random red patches, undereye discoloration and dreaded sunspots. My skin immediately looked smoother, more even and helped disguise my trouble areas.  It feels lightweight on my skin and while it's obvious that am wearing foundation when I glide my fingers across my face, it still feels surprisingly smooth with little to no drag.  After wearing it for several hours my skin still looked natural and had minimal shiny spots! My only minor issue is that certain parts of my face (cheeks and around my mouth) did clearly show dry patches but I attribute that to the drastic change in weather and my need for more moisturizer at this time of year.  Overall I will be using this on a daily basis to see how my skin reacts to consistent use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is amazing! It feels so light and comfy on my skin and it lasts long without feeling cakey. Plus, it smooths everything out and reduces pores. Being vegan is a really nice bonus too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I instantly fell in love with this foundation itu2019s so lightweight and feels just like a tint or serum that youu2019re putting on and not heavy at all which I am obsessed with ! The packaging is deluxe and I can only recommend for people who love a clean look! I will purchase this again !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very-very concentrated formula, you really don't need much to get good coverage. I use less on light hyperpigmentation and a little bit more on top over darker spots, like acne marks. It looks very skin-like and natural and has good staying power. If you have oily skin I definitely recommend using a setting spray or powder because it can get a little shiny throughout the day. It will still look good, because the formula doesn't seem to separate on the skin even when it gets a bit dewy, but a touch of setting powder in the T-zone makes it look a lot better. Overall, a beautiful finish, and my skin looks great when I wear this foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great foundation, builds nicely for a more light make up look or to have a little more coverage! Doesnu2019t look cakey at all and lasts all day without breaking up or smearing. Blends out beautifully!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Starting as a regular wearer of full coverage foundation, I was intrigued by the promises of skin-smoothing radiance and pore minimization from Rose's product, prompting me to give it a try. Its lightweight feel, buildable coverage, and ability to conceal my rosacea were definite pros. However, it didn't deliver on pore minimization and struggled to maintain its appearance throughout the day. I've found it suitable for a more natural no makeup look on quieter days, and I appreciate the brand's non-acnegenic, vegan, and non-comedogenic aspects. Despite its shortcomings, I'm interested in exploring more products from this brand due to these positive attributes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SOFTLIGHT SKIN-SMOOTHING LIQUID FOUNDATION by ROSE INC is a great liquid foundation which creates a smooth and flawless look. It has a great range of shades to choose from. I love how it stays long and minimize the pore to an extent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this is a lightweight feeling and gorgeous overall foundation.  Im easily able to wear it with a lighter amount added or I can even apply more for some extra coverage which, either way, make my pores look so much less visible. This has a beautiful finish thatu2019s so skin like, it lasted my entire day without looking like it was oily or falling apart which is a big challenge with most foundations I use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is so smooth and looks youthful when i apply it. It gives a medium to natural finish. I tested the longevity and it wore for about 14 hours in one day. When i checked my makeup late at night it still looked as if i had just applied my makeup. I highly recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation looks flawless on my skin. It looks just like my skin but better. It is a sheer foundation but covers my pores and blemishes very well. My skin is dry, but this foundation still works well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Rose Inc Liquid Foundation is a beauty enthusiast's fantasy fulfilled. With its opulent texture and customizable coverage, it stands out in the cosmetics landscape. Its smooth, silky touch flawlessly evens skin tone, resulting in a luminous, professionally finished appearance. What distinguishes this foundation is its remarkable endurance. It retains its flawless look throughout the day, avoiding any heaviness or excessive layers. This durability was evident even after a full day, a testament to its impressive long-lasting quality. Beyond its cosmetic excellence, this foundation prides itself on being vegan, non-comedogenic, and non-acnegenic, appealing to a broader audience seeking skin-friendly and ethical beauty choices. The sophisticated and practical packaging further enhances the overall experience, but it's the foundation's ability to enhance natural beauty, exuding confidence and radiance, that makes it a prized gem in any makeup collection. It's more than a mere makeup product; it's a confidence booster and an essential addition to daily beauty routines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Dry skin

It didn't oxidize for me, but I would recommend to not follow the models in the pictures as it gives an illusion of tad bit darker than your skin color. It's medium coverage foundation which is buildable as required. Overall, It wore out nicely on me for the event so I'm looking forward to using it on a daily basis as it didn't feel too heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation left my skin looking so beautiful and flawless. It didn't emphasize my texture, has buildable coverage, doesn't feel heavy and didn't cause any breakouts.  It lasted al day for me, even when I was sweating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the beat foundations for dry skin that glides very smoothly like a butter and has a buildable coverage. The formula does not oxidize and the shades stay the same all day long. I love how it doesnt budge at all

I love this foundation! It goes on super smooth and does not get very caked which I hate. You don't need.a Lot and it lasts all day! HAs a nice finish! I definitely recommend!! Love it so much! AMazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Rose inc just released this amazing new foundation and I absolutely love it. This is so creamy and smooth and blends so well with my skin. It gives great coverage and is perfect for that nice smooth finish

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this soft light skin smoothing liquid foundation so much. It is genuinely my new favorite foundation and leaves my skin looking truly unreal, I get so many compliments when wearing it and feel amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to give this foundation a try! I am very well pleased with it and is has quickly become a favorite of mine! It is lightweight on my skin and very comfortable. It applies very well and blends out super nice. I definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful foundation! Itu2019s smoothing, blurring and radiant. Itu2019s a bit more of a matte finish but still looked natural on my skin. I love that itu2019s vegan! For a medium coverage foundation itu2019s still incredibly lightweight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was very surprised by this foundation. I had not heard of this brand previously, and now I want to check out all the other products that they make. I have combination skin and it kept my oil in check through most of the day. I like that it doesnu2019t settle in your pores or fine lines and wrinkles. I recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love foundations that are also skincare because they help lock in hydration while never clogging my pores throughout the day. The new Softlight Foundation by Rose Inc blends great with a sponge or brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried RoseInc lipstick before and I was excited to try their foundation. I like that it was able to cover my redness without irritating my skin or looking cakey. My skin has been very oily lately, and this foundation still looked good after 8 hours of wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Everyone needs this foundation if your looking for something that is sensitive friendly as well as acne prone friendly. It hasnu2019t irritated my skin at all! Also, It actually blurs the pores while still appearing natural!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m obsessed with everything rose Inc does! This foundation is stunning for everyday use because itu2019s light weight but covers my rosacea and some dark spots. I do wish the shade range was more inclusive, especially in 2023!! However, the product is incredible and I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really beautiful and also creamy texture for a foundation. I have large pores and this actually covered it well, while other foundations sometimes make them more visible. It has a medium coverage but it was buildable. Iu2019m usually medium with golden undertones, but this one was a little lighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is so light weight but super buildable. It is non-acngenic, vegan, and non-comedogenic. I loved how my skin looked glowy after applying. I tried this foundation using a sponge and brush and both application looked seamless. I did not use a primer to see how the foundation acted by itself and my pores were minimized and my tzone did not get oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Rose Inc. came back with another awesome product. This foundation is very serum like and the shade range is versatile. It has light coverage, but buildable to medium and dries down matte. In order to have the best wear, make sure your skincare / skin prep is fully absorbed before applying the foundation. Although itu2019s serum like, a little goes a long way, so one pump is enough for your whole face.

reviews.review_title: Great for my acne prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne prone skin. While I wouldn't categorize it as sensitive, within a few days of using a skincare item or foundation I sometimes have to quit using it because of acne and blemishes.  Rose Inc Softlight Skin-Smoothing Hydrating foundation is an great foundation for me because it works with my reactive skin.   So when I tried this I knew I had to give it a few days and so far so good. No acne or blemishes.  The consistency is liquidy and more translucent than other foundations I use. When applied it reacts like a serum. The finish is matte without being drying. It is like a creamy matte, It is easily buildable to get the coverage you need although one application is enough to cover the face well. After a full day it doesn't make my face oily.  So I like it. My only complaint is I think they need to do something better about the models on the page because I got the wrong foundation and it was too light for me. I feel like the models don't match the foundation colors. I chose based on the model.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Rose Inc Softlight Skin-Smoothing Liquid Foundation in 17C (Medium with cool pink undertone) is a breeze to apply and blend, and it comes off easily at the end of the day. It's also good for your skin, with ingredients that help to control oil, reduce redness, and brighten your complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally trying thr Rose Inc the Softlight Skin-Smoothing Liquid Foundation here are my honest thoughts! From the beautiful pigment to the dewy ness of this foundation I am absolutely obsessed!! As Iu2019m getting older Iu2019m leaning more to foundations with a hydrating finish and this foundation delivers! I also wore it all day in the skin and it stayed put really nicely without any weird fading, oxidation or textureu2026.love!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. Itu2019s easy to use. I used a beauty blender to put it on. It matches my skin so nicely. I love how it lasts all day. I donu2019t have to set it with powder or anything. It doesnu2019t have a smell either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've got to share my experience with this foundation. I put it on at 7 AM, and it was still slaying after a 15-hour marathon of work and a concert. But, here's the real scoop u2013 no matter your age, prepping your skin is key for that all-day glow. I used a trusty powder puff and a light spritz of elf setting spray, and this foundation played nice. Now, age ain't nothing but a number, and this foundation knows it. I've got combo skin, and my cheeks turn into a tomato sometimes. But this foundation covered the redness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have dry or sensitive skin, or if you are looking for a hydrating foundation with a natural finish, Rose Inc Softlight Skin-Smoothing Hydrating Foundation is a good option to consider. However, if you have oily or combination skin, or if you are concerned about the foundation settling into fine lines and wrinkles, you may want to try a different product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After I applied the Rose Inc Softlight Skin-Smoothing Liquid Foundation to my face, I noticed it feels weightless and has medium coverage. It is fairly hydrating and smooths out my skin along with making my overall appearance less oily.
